page.title: 14HOTELS & PUBS _ DURDAR AREA
page.content: { CARROW HOUSE}_ stands just N. of the Golden Fleece interchange on the M6 on a cut_off portion of what used to be the main A6 trunk road.It used to be a private house until just after World War II.It has 18 bedrooms, an a_la_carte restaurant open 7 days a week and 3 conference rooms catering for from 25 to 130 people.It employs 20 staff including par_timers and 5 students.It is owned by Mathew Brown's the brewers and has a thriving local trade. {BLACK LION}_ situated in Durdar,it is a public house owned also by Mathew Brown.It serves bar snacks at lunch time and in the evening.Lots of local people go there and all those we spoke to thought it offered good value. {WHITE QUEY}_ a small public house near Stoneraise.A quey is the Scottish word for a heifer and is pronounced 'cow'.
